## 653. Two Sum IV - Input is a BST (Easy)

<p>Given a Binary Search Tree and a target number, return true if there exist two elements in the BST such that their sum is equal to the given target.</p>

<p><b>Example 1:</b><br />
<pre>
<b>Input:</b> 
    5
   / \
  3   6
 / \   \
2   4   7

Target = 9

<b>Output:</b> True
</pre>
</p>


<p><b>Example 2:</b><br />
<pre>
<b>Input:</b> 
    5
   / \
  3   6
 / \   \
2   4   7

Target = 28

<b>Output:</b> False
</pre>
</p>
